body.p: Paducah Gov. B. Magoffin Frankfort Ky.

All the Steamboats at this point were sent up Tennessee River last night -- this mornig at daylight Federal Gun Boat Lexington was again Cruising in front of this city and in the mouth of the Tennessee River Sent boat ashore to enquire after the Steam boats and whether there were cannon or Small arms to defend the City She is said to be now lying below the City I shall go to Cairo as you requested
